content.raw:
Changed this to a blocker. I continually see the robot caught in 'standing' status after a skip. We can't run the competition with this situation. 

The robot has to come down in a decent position not totally discombobulated or hung up on other entities in the landscape. 

Even when it works there is an inordinate amount of blood, sweat and tears spent in creating code to get the robot back into a reasonable stance, especially getting the feet into a decent orientation. 

Go back to the original skip process and only re-harness when fallen.
